page.title: 09Landscape, Scoutmoor.
page.content: As the Rossendale Way runs through Turn Village providing many alternative walks, it is of major interest to hikers.Along the Way there is a Turnpike on Walley Road, established in 1801.Bury Old Road, running from Bury to Rawtenstall is an ancient highway, which can still be traced from Bury to Rawstenstall and which was in use up to the beginning of the 19th century, For those who fancy a drink the white "Plane Tree Inn"provides a friendly service in a relaxed atmosphere.It provides bar snacks and meals, and in the summer months afternoon teas are also available in the bear garden.
